Label: 🌍 Project '44
Description: Explore the liberation of Europe through detailed Second World War battle maps, unit positions, and Canadian Army war diaries.

Label: 📖 Project Athena
Description: Share and explore stories of Canadian service in Afghanistan, creating a collaborative digital history of Canada’s longest war.

Label: ⚔️ Dieppe Raid Interactive Map
Description: Relive Operation Jubilee with an animated web map that captures the pivotal Allied assault on the French port of Dieppe.

Label: ✈️ Bomber Command Interactive Map
Description: Discover the missions of 419 Squadron and the heroic contributions of Canadian airmen in RAF Bomber Command.

Label: 🗺️ Top WW2 Interactive Maps
Description: Uncover Canada’s military history through immersive maps covering D-Day, the Italian Campaign, Hong Kong, Kiska, and more.

Label: 🏖️ Maps of Juno Beach
Description: Trace Canada’s D-Day legacy with detailed maps highlighting troop movements, key landmarks, and the Normandy landings.

Label: 📜 D-Day Maps
Description: Relive the strategies and sacrifices that defined the Normandy invasion.

Label: 🚀 Market Garden Maps
Description: Follow the bold Allied plans of Operation Market Garden with comprehensive maps.

Label: 🌍 WW2 Maps
Description: Explore the global stories of the Second World War through precise and engaging cartography.

Label: 🏛️ Canadian War Museum
Description: Dive into Canada’s rich military history at one of the world’s most respected war museums.

Label: 📚 Juno Beach Centre
Description: Visit this Canadian cultural centre in Normandy to honour the 45,000 Canadians who gave their lives during the Second World War.

Label: 🎖️ The Military Museums
Description: Discover eight museums under one roof, showcasing the Army, Navy, Air Force, and regimental histories of Alberta.

Label: ⚓ Dieppe Raid Museum
Description: Step back in time at this museum dedicated to the 1942 Raid on Dieppe, featuring artifacts and exhibits in a historic theatre.
